mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM xm_contactdetails LEFT JOIN xm_account ON xm_account.accountid = xm_contactdetails.accountid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_contactdetails.smownerid WHERE xm_contactdetails.deleted = 0 and 1=1 ${filter}
SELECT xm_account.* FROM xm_account LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_account.smownerid WHERE 1=1 ${filter} limit #{start},#{rows}

SELECT count(1) FROM xm_contactdetails INNER JOIN xm_campaigncontrel ON xm_campaigncontrel.contactid = xm_contactdetails.contactid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_contactdetails.smownerid = xm_users.id WHERE xm_campaigncontrel.campaignid = #{campaignid} AND xm_contactdetails.deleted = 0 ORDER BY modifiedtime desc

SELECT xm_users.user_name, xm_contactdetails.*, xm_contactdetails.contactid AS crmid FROM xm_contactdetails INNER JOIN xm_campaigncontrel ON xm_campaigncontrel.contactid = xm_contactdetails.contactid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_contactdetails.smownerid = xm_users.id WHERE xm_campaigncontrel.campaignid = #{campaignid} AND xm_contactdetails.deleted = 0 ORDER BY modifiedtime desc limit #{start},#{rows}
